title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Meeting with Secretary-General Antonio Manuel de Oliveira Guterres of the United Nations – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
September 25, 2018
Today, President Donald J. Trump met with Secretary-General Antonio Manuel de Oliveira Guterres of the United Nations in New York.  The two leaders discussed their common interest in resolving some of the world’s most pressing challenges, including those related to proliferation, terrorism, and other threats to international peace and security.  Both leaders pledged to remain in close contact over the coming months.
